3: One by one, according to order! Don't rush in!
Even if you rushed in first, you won't be getting more food!
Five adults, a hundred and forty kids.
City 019 cannot take in as many refugees as it did before.
But we came a long way here!
But have you ever seen this many plump and well-fed kids queuing up?
This means they are tougher than the normal bunch and can take on more work in the city.
Of course, your ol' sis here... I mean, I'm the one with exceptional caretaking abilities.
This amount of high-quality workforce is going to be a blessing to your...
Alright, alright, just get in already!
Oh my, did you hear, children? Come now! Say thank you to Mr. Soldier!
